com.hazelcast.cache.impl.nearcache.impl

Interface NearCacheRecordMap<K,V extends NearCacheRecord>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of the key
    V - type of the NearCacheRecord to be stored
    All Superinterfaces:
    ConcurrentMap<K,V>, EvictableStore<K,V>, Map<K,V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SampleableNearCacheRecordMap<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeapNearCacheRecordMap

    public interface NearCacheRecordMap<K,V extends NearCacheRecord>
extends ConcurrentMap<K,V>, EvictableStore<K,V>
    Contract point for all record maps to be used for storage in near-cache.
    See Also:
    NearCacheRecord, EvictableStore
